label: uncl7007
comment: Code specifying a physical or logical state.

values.label: Split
values.comment: Separated into multiple units.

values.label: Missing
values.comment: Absent or lacking.

values.label: Wrong identification
values.comment: The actual identification is different from the given identification.

values.label: Damaged
values.comment: In a damaged state.

values.label: Good condition
values.comment: In a state of good condition.

values.label: Wrong product
values.comment: The product is wrong.

values.label: On hold
values.comment: Held, awaiting further action.

values.label: Proposed
values.comment: The object is in a proposed state.

values.label: Accepted
values.comment: The object is in an accepted state.

values.label: Scheduled
values.comment: The object is in a scheduled state.

values.label: Completed
values.comment: The object is in a completed state.

values.label: Rejected
values.comment: The object is in a rejected state.

values.label: Postponed
values.comment: The object is in a postponed state.

values.label: Cancelled
values.comment: The object is in a cancelled state.

values.label: Obsolete
values.comment: The object is obsolete.

values.label: Fresh
values.comment: Retaining the original properties, not impaired by spoilage or preservation.

values.label: Defective
values.comment: The object is defective or faulty.

values.label: Solid
values.comment: A substance in the fundamental state of matter that retains its size and shape without need of a container.

values.label: Gas
values.comment: Matter in a state where it occupies whatever volume is available.

values.label: Liquid
values.comment: Matter in a state where it maintains a fixed volume but adapts to the shape of its container.

values.label: Return goods
values.comment: Identified goods are to be returned according to specified conditions.

values.label: Dispose of goods
values.comment: The identified goods are to be disposed of.

values.label: Destroy goods
values.comment: The identified goods are to be destroyed.

values.label: Repair goods
values.comment: The identified goods are to be repaired.

values.label: Hold for examination
values.comment: The identified goods are to be held for examination.

values.label: Return refused
values.comment: The return of the identified goods has been refused.

values.label: Product safety alert
values.comment: The product is affected by a safety alert.
